Reviews.Title: “I would recommend this hotel to family and friends.”
Reviews.Author: kerusso
Reviews.Content: Great Value! If you are looking for a clean and affordable hotel in Branson then the Brookwood Inn is a good choice. We stayed here based on the reviews we read and were not disappointed. The staff are polite and professional. The continental breakfast is good. Like others have said the cobbler and ice cream in the evening is a real treat. The only negative for us was there was no laundry facility. Other than that it was a great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service from Aaron”
Reviews.Author: Cherie W
Reviews.Content: I want to say that my stay at the inn was very comfortable as well as clean. I appreciate Aaron for being polite, curteous and helpful. I recommend this anyone looking for a clean american owned stay.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Trip”
Reviews.Author: kansasgrannie
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our 3 night stay at this conveniently located hotel in Branson. Found the staff to be pleasant, room was nice and quiet and the bed was very comfortable. Our room was very clean each day when we returned. Breakfast was average, the room where it was served is very roomy and nice. Everything was conveniently located on the breakfast bar. Some of the food left a little to be desired (sausage gravy and the eggs). Appreciated being able to purchase show tickets at a reduced rate, and the shows we saw were excellent (IT and Clay Cooper). We will stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable, and Excellent Customer Service.”
Reviews.Author: iowafam6
Reviews.Content: I wanted a room that was clean and comfortable and that is what I got. Customer service is excellent.. Even before we arrived I called on the phone and was given ticket information, the front desk clerk was very helpful and very polite.. During our stay we recieved the same wonderful customer service.. The room we had was 301 and was very clean. The room view was the miniture golf course that is located next door and was a pretty view. The only thing that would of made the room better would be a mini fridge and softer toilet paper.. We did not use the pool during our stay. The breakfast has quite a few choices. We tried the biscuits and gravy, juice and donuts. The dessert was good, softserve icecream, cookies and cobbler.. Close to many attractions. We would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel Experience in Years”
Reviews.Author: Don B
Reviews.Content: We were entered in the 2012 Super Summer Cruise & Car Show and were looking for a convenient and reasonably priced place to stay so scouted options on line & booked Brookwood on Priceline. This place is fantastic & I have absolutely no negative comments. We called ahead on Friday noon to see if we could get an early check-in so we could empty the cars before the show registration. When we arrived about 30 minutes later, our room was ready & check-in was easy and quick. Several families were looking for rooms without a reservation and despite being sold out, the staff made several calls to assist them. Very convenient location on the yellow route with restaurants close by, car wash across the street, and a nice mini-putt course next door. Breakfast was exceptional, adequate times, well supplied and very clean. Evening hot cobblers with ice cream & cookies was well received and a very nice touch. We needed quarters for the car wash & there were no questions about what they were for and a roll was readily provided. Lauri the manager was very friendly, highly organized, and a very hard worker as she was always on the go helping guests. Rooms were very clean with soft towels and good AC units. Shower had sufficient pressure and spray. Cleaning staff was very friendly & all had a nice word to say to guests. Pool was very nice and area kept clean. Yard and parking areas were well maintained & clean. The pictures for this motel do not do it justice and more should be added to better show the great amenities. Price was very reasonable considering all the amenities, cleanliness, and friendly atmosphere. I will definitely stay here again during the show next year. My hat's off to Lauri & her fellow staff...keep up the exceptional presentation!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel-Great Price”
Reviews.Author: Raul71923
Reviews.Content: This was my first time staying at this hotel. I will definitly be back. It is located off the strip, so it was a little easier getting around town. It was close to the Tanger and several good resteraunts. Our rooms were very clean! The service was excellent. The a/c worked wonderfully. Breakfast was served each morning until 10 which was nice because I don't like to get up early. It included a variety of foods and was very good- waffles, toast, bagels, donuts, fruit, yogurt, several different cereals, coffee, juices, cappichino, and milk. At night there was a dessert bar which was a nice treat! It had fresh cookies, peach and blackberry cobbler, and soft serve ice cream. Checkout wasn't until 1pm. That was very nice to not have to get up and rush around on our last day. It has an outdoor pool. It was a great hotel and for a great low price!!! I would 100% recommend Brookwood Inn to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Shari B
Reviews.Content: This was my first time at this hotel. I had never stayed off the strip before but wanted to try something different. I stayed in a 3rd floor king room. It was sparkling clean and I loved the sink outside of the bathroom. The breakfast room was right off the 3rd floor and very convenient. WOW what a breakfast! Waffles, biscuits & gravy, eggs, toast etc. Every night they had cobbler, ice cream and cookies. We only had to eat one meal out thanks to our hotel. It was so easy getting around and didn't have to fight the strip traffic as much. I would DEFINITELY stay at this hotel again :)

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - Great Location”
Reviews.Author: vicky9603
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights. The room was great (clean, roomy, comfortable bed, and had everything that we needed). I normally go through Priceline to get rooms but prices even with bidding are getting too high. I called Brookwood Inn; got my room cheaper than i would have through bidding, got the room that i wanted and was treated as if i was the best customer they had talked to all day. The lady that answered the phone told me that i would be very well pleased and she was right. The breakfast was good and the desserts in the evening were a pleasant surprise. We were within walking distance of many of our favorite attractions. We make the trip to Branson at least 3 times a year....we won't be staying anywhere else but Brookwood Inn now.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Isaac R
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a few nights while on a trip with friends. Rooms were clean, friendly staff, nice pool, decent breakfast, and they even serve soft-serve ice cream and cobbler at night! And to top it off they had one of the lowest rates in the area. We were very impressed and will definitely stay there again if we're ever in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Hot outside cool inside”
Reviews.Author: LTH77
Reviews.Content: Had a great stay AC worked great in our room.Room was very clean.Would stay there again.The location was great.Had never stayed there before but had stayed at other hotels that is owned by the same people.Did not use pool but it did look clean.Just down the road from Lone Star steak house.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!!”
Reviews.Author: Brendajo1960
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Brookwood Inn when we took our two grandsons to Branson for a couple of days. I had read good reviews before booking the hotel so we decided to stay there. We were very pleased with the cleanliness of the room and the comfortable beds. A plus that we always look for in a hotel room is whether or not it has a separate vanity outside of the main bathroom/shower area and it did and it had a very nice size of counter area. The pool was also very clean and seemed to be,bigger than most hotel pools. There was also a delicious variety of breakfast foods with Krispy Kreme donuts!! The boys enjoyed the evening time ice cream and cookies. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good experience”
Reviews.Author: Trippersix
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had a very good experience at this hotel. We had a king bed with a recliner. The room was very clean and comfortable. The hot breakfast in the morning was very good and what a treat to have cobbler and soft serve ice cream every evening before we went bed. Thank you employees at Brookwood Inn for a very good overnight experience.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel staff friendly and helpful”
Reviews.Author: ronron1990
Reviews.Content: Excellent value and excellent customer service! Breakfast was good and nightly dessert was good after a day of playinng!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: RickandJudy
Reviews.Content: An acquaintance recommended the Brookwood Inn. As there seem to be a zillion hotels in Branson we decided to act upon her experience. We are so happy that we stayed at the Brookwood. The staff was friendly, helpful and hardworking. Our rooms were clean, lovely and quiet. We were impressed with the breakfast buffet (waffles, Krispy Kreme doughnuts, coffee 24/7). And then we were really spoiled in the evening with fresh baked cookies, cobbler and ice-cream ! Wow! The WiFi was very high speed which surprised me. The location was centered to all the shows and still a quiet relaxing atmosphere. I want to give an extra pat on the back to the cleaning staff. Our rooms were always spotless…. there were no short cuts taken. My wife and I felt very confident staying in these rooms . Thank you so much. We will highly recommend the Brookwood Inn to anyone vacationing in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Impressed”
Reviews.Author: LindenBJ
Reviews.Content: I normally stay in more expensive hotels, but we needed something cheap for a quick stay & play in branson. I wanted a smoke & pet free hotel due to allergies. There is plenty of hot water, good water pressure. Never woke up (which I normally do at home) so I give the mattresses & the walls an A++, Breakfast was good, they had waffles, juice, biscuits & gravy, cereal, etc. We didn't use the pool, but we saw plenty of guest having fun in it. We were too stuffed from dinner (at McFarlin's Restaurant) to enjoy their late snack of ice cream & cobbler. A/C worked well. All the staff were nice & I did not experience a problem at all.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best in the area!”
Reviews.Author: MaryAnn H
Reviews.Content: We stayed two nights for our first trip here, and if we were ever to come back - which we probably won't - we'd stay here again. Extremely pleasant and efficient staff. Rooms were clean and bright. As other reviewers have said, an important upgrade would be to add at least a small refrigerator and perhaps a microwave. Not very busy while we were there a little before the season (late April) so we had plenty of quiet. Close to everything, but not on the main event roads so much less traffic and a way to avoid the main roads crushes. Very competitive pricing and includes hot/cold continental breakfast and late evening (too late for us) dessert bar.

Reviews.Title: “Inconvenience”
Reviews.Author: Wanda W
Reviews.Content: The facilities and staff are great. The eating area access was very ill thought out. Texas Holdem group monopolized and noisy. Wouldn't stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Reliably Great”
Reviews.Author: kmcink
Reviews.Content: This is my favorite Branson hotel. They're friendly, the room is clean and even a bit luxurious (the bed and pillows), plus the food is great. I love the place, and hesitate to review it because it might get really busy!! A microwave and a fridge would be nice, but I like the rate as-is, so I'm satisfied.

Reviews.Title: “nice, comfortable, good amenities”
Reviews.Author: KenBColorado
Reviews.Content: We stayed 6 nights not long after they opened for the season. Room was very clean and beds were comfortable. No fridge or microwave. Wi-Fi worked well and no logon hassles. Just fire it up. Right next door to a putt-putt golf course that plays music while open. And, they mow the grass every morning. I think it closes by 9:30P or so. No biggee, but there is some noise especially on the west/upper side. Rooms have outdoor entrances which was nice since we could park right outside our first-floor room. It was very inexpensive ($55 incl taxes/night). Very nice breakfast area with hot breakfast. They also had late-night cobbler and ice cream and cookies set out. Not good for us since we try to avoid gluten. Very convenient location about a block south of the main drag.

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: Sarah C
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Brookwood Inn in August, 2011 with our 4 kids ages 6, 5, 2.5 and 3.5 months and thought it was great for the price. It was very clean and the breakfast and dessert were good. It would be nice to have a fridge and microwave, but it wasn't that big of a deal since we had a cooler and there was a microwave available in the breakfast area. It is a very basic motel, but clean and updated. We have stayed in condos, camped (RV) and stayed at a resort in Branson and the Brookwood Inn is a very good option for when we want to save a little $$$! We would definitely recommend this place to our friends and family!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Bootsie01
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed the Brookwood Inn in Branson. It was very convenient to everything and off the hubbub of the Strip. The rooms were clean and everyone was very friendly. Breakfast was great and the after-show desserts were delicious (especially the cobbler & ice cream!). I was a little disappointed there was no coffeemaker in the room. Other than that, everything was great! We would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Brookwood Inn, Branson, Mo”
Reviews.Author: Jerry S
Reviews.Content: I am a travel agent owner of Simons Cruise and Travel Shoppe in Midway, Utah and brought with me several couple and stayed 6 night at the Brookwood Inn in Branson, Mo. The rooms where excellent, clean and very comfortable. The service at the front desk was most helpful and the warm breakfast and late evening snacks were the best ever. The Inn is very convenient to all of the attractions and shows. We really enjoyed our stay and will be bring back several more couple next year for the Christmas season. Jerry Simons, Owner

Reviews.Title: “Plain, But Very Clean”
Reviews.Author: JnR2
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 days, making reservations in advance. Check in was easy and simple. The room was a basic motel room, but with very good/new beds. From what we could tell the entire building has recently had a good upgrade. The staff was friendly. Breakfast included b-n-g, cereal, waffles, eggs, fruit, yogurt, and Krispy Kreme donuts. They also serve cobbler and ice cream of the evening. There are 3 floors, with no elevator. Also, the breakfast room is on the second floor. Our room was $63 (2 qn), not including tax. The facility's cleanliness is their best feature. It's location is convenient. It was what we expected, but not more.

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL-WILL RETURN”
Reviews.Author: mariejackson
Reviews.Content: My sisters and I had the great honor of spending 3 nights at your hotel. We made a great choice. From the moment we checked in the friendly staff were always there to help. We did not have show tickets before we came and the clerk made phone calls to get us tickets-also they have tickets to sell at the front desk. Our room was on the 3rd floor. We parked in the back of the hotel and only had to climb one flight of stairs. No problem for us. Our room was spotless and very comfortable beds with good pillows. A lot of hotels have flat pillows but not the Brookwood Inn. The breakfast area is open all day so you can have coffee and cappuccino whenever you want. The breakfast was everything you could ask for. A good variety of breads to choose from. They had 2 kinds of eggs, biscuits, gravy, fruit, variety of hot and cold cereals, waffles(you make yourself), yogurts, juices, and hot coffee. I almost forgot they did not have just any donuts, they offered Krispie Cream donuts. The breakfast if open until 10:00 in the morning which made it nice on the mornings we did not have shows and slept in a while. This made it nice as there was not a crowd of people in the morning. The breakfast area is always clean. They offer nightly cobbler, cookies and ice cream. Cannot say enough good things about the hotel. We will return on our next trip to Branson. Recommend this hotel highly.

Reviews.Title: “Welcome mat is always out!”
Reviews.Author: Patricia S
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for several years during our annual shopping trip to Branson. Super, friendly folks and the breakfast offered enough to satisfy anyone. Quality rooms at a good price. Off the "strip" of Hwy 76 and close to some really great restaurants. Will check this out next time we are going to be in town.....

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay...”
Reviews.Author: dyke4
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at Brookwood. The personnel were "the best", our room was clean, current, and comfortable. The pillows and comforters were THE BEST. There was a nice variety of choices for breakfast and we topped off our night with hot blueberry or peach cobbler and ice cream. We would highly recommend it for couples or a group. The gathering room would provide a great place for a group to meet over an awesome treat!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: shells501
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an inexpensive, simple, clean, updated place with a free breakfast, I recommend the Brookwood Inn, The beds were comfortable and provided a good nights sleep. There is a large well lighted breakfast/gathering room with a balcony and outside deck (minimum furniture on the deck). The free breakfast was very good and offered a good variety. There were cookies and 2 kinds of cobblers along with soft serve ice cream for the "after show" dessert time. Being a 2 star, there was no exercise room but there is a nice walkway around the 2nd and 3rd levels and I got in a morning walk making laps around the level. The staff was among the best we have encountered anywhere. They were very helpful and friendly. On the down side no fridge or microwave but the ice machine was conveniently located and with the free breakfast and dessert time a microwave wasn't really necessary.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Betty T
Reviews.Content: This was a very pleasant place to stay. Convenient to everything. Clean. Very nice personnel. Their breakfast & evening offerings are superb.

Reviews.Title: “Best bargain for the money!”
Reviews.Author: Billski52
Reviews.Content: Based on TripAdvisor reviews we booked a room at the Brookwood Inn for our recent visit to Branson. We truly enjoyed our stay! Our room was a King on the 3rd floor. There are no elevators on the property, but as is common in Branson there are multiple levels to the parking lot so we only had 1 flight of stairs. The room was exceptionally clean, updated, and provided everything needed for a short stay. The breakfast was similar to other motels offerings, but the late-night snack was out of this world! The cobbler and ice cream was exactly what you need after a late show. Delicious! The staff was friendly & very outgoing, offering any assistance they could to make our stay enjoyable. To conclude, we have found our new, favorite motel for our Branson getaways!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: ronadi
Reviews.Content: We've stayed here before when it was the Alpen Rose, it was needing updating and we almost didn't call. I read that it not only had a new name but had been updated. I was pleasantly surprised when we checked in, the room was indeed updated, it was fresh and clean with new furniture and the bed was wonderful. The breakfast was great, it had hot and cold cereal, Krispy Kreme donuts, scrambled eggs, biscuits and gravy, two kinds of belgium waffles, fruit, yogurt, coffee and juices. In the evening they had cherry and peach cobbler, ice cream and cookies, they put it out at 9pm (wish it was a little earlier but worth the wait). The staff was very helpful and friendly. They have a computer you can use in the lobby but also have free wifi in the rooms. We will definitely stay here again, you can't beat the amenities and location.

Reviews.Title: “A Branson Gem”
Reviews.Author: EMSchick312
Reviews.Content: Very clean facility, great front desk service and one of the biggest outdoor pools I've been in! Rooms were very clean and not just "on the surface" clean. Breakfast offered good variety and dessert at night is a great bonus. The cost is very reasonable- even in the high season. We will be staying here again!

Reviews.Title: “Our home away from home!!”
Reviews.Author: wandiv2431
Reviews.Content: This is the third time we have stayed at The Brookwood Inn. It is the best hoel we have ever staed in. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. the staff is extremely friendly and welcoming and the breakfast and evening desert are just wonderful!! It is our Branson home away from home!!!

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again”
Reviews.Author: tengland123
Reviews.Content: Great motel....cheap, clean and good location. We saved a lot of money on breakfast, since they provide a good variety. Noticed employees stayed busy our entire stay, cleaning all the time. Room was nice, bedding wonderful. Only problem in room, #211,shower squealed, not just our room, room above us also. If we could have changed anything it wouldve been pool hours. As hot as it gets in summer, later hours would've been better. Otherwise, great place for price we paid!

Reviews.Title: “We had very good service and the room wa nice and clean”
Reviews.Author: HarleyWichitaKS_
Reviews.Content: We were able to get the type of room we wanted, in the location we wanted which was nice not to have to carry everything upstairs.The breakfast and desserts extra good! Very good cookies and ice cream. The help at the front desk was very helpful in showing me how to get to a certain store that I needed to find. The pool was nice and our overall stay was very good for the price we paid. The only thing we wished we had was a fridge and coffee pot. The location is great. Just a block off the strip and right next door is a very nice miniature golf course. This motel is a sister to 3 others in Branson. We have stayed at the others before and enjoyed them also. This was our first time at the Brookwood Inn. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay!”
Reviews.Author: pennyloafer
Reviews.Content: Wonderful location on the "yellow route" right off Gretna Rd. Very clean, friendly staff, sufficient breakfast included, plus blackberry or peach cobbler served in the evening. If you're looking for a great value, this is the place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Fun trip”
Reviews.Author: timebomb54
Reviews.Content: We started at another hotel in Branson and didn't like it. We walked up the street to a hotel we stayed at last year called the Branson Best but they had no open rooms for the amount of days we had requested. The employees commented that they had another hotel up the street we can check on. We said, "Great." They called the Brookside Inn and they got us in right away. Both hotels were very clean, had great food, and great service. You have fantastic staff. Everyone was very nice . We will be back and we will always stay in your hotels. Thanks for the memories.

Reviews.Title: “Nice ,Clean Hotel and Great staff”
Reviews.Author: Jimmy6565
Reviews.Content: Had a really good stay. All the staff was very friendly and helpful on recommendations on restaurants and attractions. Nightly desserts were nice and beds were really comfortable! Would definately stay again!!

Reviews.Title: “Probably won't stay again.”
Reviews.Author: ArkieMom
Reviews.Content: When we asked for an extra blanket for the kids, we were told she couldn't leave front desk and didn't have any. So we had to go buy a blanket while on vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place and We will definitely go back”
Reviews.Author: DoverDolphinGirl
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very clean and staff was very friendly. We have stayed at numerous places in Branson and this is one of the best.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel ever!”
Reviews.Author: cj_southbend
Reviews.Content: Hotel is fairly new, still looks great, very clean rooms. Management was very helpful in every request. This will definitely be a hotel where I will return. We met and spoke with another manager from a different hotel (not connected with this hotel) and he complimented the owner of the hotels (Savannah, Whispering Inn, Branson's Best & Brookwood), saying she was very particular and really took good care of her properties.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem @ a Great Price”
Reviews.Author: ruclever12
Reviews.Content: After 10 years away from Branson we decided to back to the same hotel we had visited at least 3 times, 10 years ago. Formerly the Alpenrose, the Brookwood did not disappoint but exceeded our expecations. The rate of 55.00 per night was just a bonus. They were very nice and offered a decent breakfast and a dessert happy hour from 9-11 pm. They are located on the yellow route which made it easy to get from Dixie Stampede to Sight & Sounds and avoid the traffic of the strip.

Reviews.Title: “The Hotel that thinks it is a B&B!”
Reviews.Author: VBlack
Reviews.Content: The Inn has recently been bought and redone. The new beds are awesome. Providing a hot breakfast of scrambled eggs, biscuits and gravy, and made on the spot waffles makes this hotel a favorite. The cobbler, ice cream, and baked cookies in the evening are the "icing on the cake!" With all this food to offer its guests we only had to buy one meal a day. The eating area is in a loft above the office area so there is no way to get to it without going up or down steps depending on which level you are staying on. There are 3 other "sister" hotels in the Branson area so just call them and ask for another hotel location that doesn't have the steps issue. They all serve the same food.

Reviews.Title: “Wedding Bliss”
Reviews.Author: kristiemontrois
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Brookwood Inn for our honeymoon night after our wedding; my bridal party and I the night before. The Hickory Room was GORGEOUS!!! The staff was very friendly and willing to serve on a moments notice. The shower/sauna in the room was like taking a shower in the rain. We plan to return for our anniversary next year.

Reviews.Title: “Under New Management.”
Reviews.Author: business_travelier
Reviews.Content: Used a travel coupon for a reasonable rate. Property has very recently changed management, so while management has added a waffle maker, the former artwork (gallery) and much of the character has pretty much been removed. That said, Room was very clean. Furnishings include budget sled based chairs and unmatted artwork, although the assumably original headboards, nightstand, and other furniture seem slightly nicer than many Branson motels of this vintage. Bed was fine and everything seemed to work OK. Only 2 specific negatives to note which may or may not be issues for others --- showerhead was placed at about 5'6" in my room and the hotel while built into a hillside which allows ground level access from two levels, but the motel lacks an elevator, and is quiet unfriendly to senior citizens or those with physical disabilities as the motel's Breakfast area is located on the second floor which appears to be only accessible by walking a great many steps from either the lobby or via entering on the 3rd (top floor) and going down steps to the breakfast room.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Hawkflying
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel is great because it is close to all of the outlet malls. There is a continental breakfast included that includes fresh waffles cooked while you wait. It is clean and the staff is friendly. It is a great value for the price. We will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “A Peaceful Stay”
Reviews.Author: singlebelle
Reviews.Content: My best friend and I chose the Alpenrose Inn during our recent trip to Branson because it was inexpensive (just $45.00 a night) and had higher ratings than some of the pricier places listed on the travel websites we researched. The staff was friendly, the room was clean, and the complimentary breakfast was filling. I especially liked the fresh waffles and the gift shop in the lobby. The inn is right next door to the Pirate's Cove mini golf course. I would imagine that it gets a little noisy during the summer, but our stay was peaceful and relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “The Alpenrose is a great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: marimoore
Reviews.Content: My husband, sister, brother-in-law, and I stayed at the Alpenrose for 6 nights (2 handicapped rooms) in April, 2008. The staff and management were very helpful and friendly; rooms were clean and comfortable; breakfast was good. A very pleasant and affordable place to stay; and a great location! We had a wonderful time and hope to be repeat customers at the Alpenrose in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great motel!!”
Reviews.Author: BRNSNFANS
Reviews.Content: This is our home away from home whenever we are in Branson. We make a least two trips a year. We always reserve one of their king suite rooms. All rooms are non-smoking which is a big plus for us. They are located on one of the alternate routes so it is very easy to get around. Very clean, extremely friendly workers and just a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Invasion of Privacy”
Reviews.Author: EJHSTL
Reviews.Content: We checked into the hotel got a room and then went to a show. When we returned there was a note on our door that said not to enter but go to the front desk. The night clerk said a mistake was made and they moved our stuff without asking to another room. We were not to happy about the situation and they did not do anything as a compensation. If you want your personal belonging gone thru this is the hotel for you. We will NEVER stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A Perfect Stay”
Reviews.Author: DaveFife
Reviews.Content: I did research from Scotland in UK for a place to stay in Branson and came up with the Alpenrose Inn. It had good reports on TripAdvisor so I decided to go for it. I can say that I had originally booked for 3 nights but enjoyed the Inn and Branson so much that my wife and I stayed for 5 nights. The Alpenrose Inn was very clean, staff very helpful and informative about the local area and attractions. The Continental Breakfast was more than adequate with fruit juice, cereals, fresh waffles,coffee, toast. I would certainly stay again at the Alpenrose Inn should I return to Branson

Reviews.Title: “Thanks to Loraine at Alpenrose our vacation was saved”
Reviews.Author: Ozark_Lady
Reviews.Content: We'd just had a horrible experience (see my Gobbler's Mountain Resort review) and were frantic for a place to stay. There was a car show going on and everything was either full or had a 2 day minimum and we only had one day left. Called Alpenrose early in the morning and spoke to Loraine. Usually you can't check in a hotel before 2:00 but when I explained the jam we were in she told us to come on and she'd have our room ready. We arrived to a CLEAN room and a FRIENDLY person...... I was feeling better already. The rooms aren't fancy but the price isn't either. We paid $55 for a king and all rooms are non-smoking. The bed was comfortable, the room was spotless, free wireless internet , continental breakfast and a nice pool. One of the advantages that this inn would have in cooler weather is that they are right next door, on the same side of the street, to Pirates Cove Minature Golf and a go-kart track. I was sorry it was so hot when we were there (105 degrees) because the minature golf course really looks neat. All you'd have to do is have pizza delivered and walk next door to entertain the kids in case you were tired of fighting traffic.

Reviews.Title: “A great place!”
Reviews.Author: jaycotraveler
Reviews.Content: This place is almost perfect! The price was reasonable, it was clean and the management was nice. Plenty of hot soft water. Didn't expect soft water! They have breakfast in two levels, plus an outside eating area, all super clean. They have waffles, cold cereal/milk, a small cup of caned fruit (limit one) and toast/jelly, coffee/tea and juice...that's it.. No rolls or eggs or anything else! No protein at all. But the price was cheap, so maybe that is all they could afford. We went out for breakfast after the first day. The motel was near everything and we would go back. BTW food in Branson is very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Won't stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: pisceseyes1
Reviews.Content: Was scheduled to stay from June21-25th. Checked out after first night. If you like screaming kids next door and thumping on the walls, then this is the place for you. Management was no help. The place was not full so why they put kids next door to a couple is beyond me.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Quiet”
Reviews.Author: lovetotravel064
Reviews.Content: Very pleasant check in. (call them direct for a king bed-travel websites only have queen beds) Room was clean and very nice. We stayed in room 120 which was by the ice machine so a little noisy so I would ask for any room but that one. Hotel is off the beaten path a few blocks so it was quiet but still on a main street that took us easily to 76. Continental breakfast was average--juice, coffee, cereal, toast. For light eaters like us, it was fine. I would recomment this hotel for your stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice motel”
Reviews.Author: vhcath
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased with the Alpenrose Inn. Even though it was inexpensive, the rooms were very clean and comfortable. It is a non-smoking motel so the rooms did not have the musty smell some smoking facilities have. I will be returning next year for another shopping trip and will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “What a great place!”
Reviews.Author: 226AnneM226
Reviews.Content: Was at the Alpenrose the weekend of Nov. 3rd and the place is great! We stayed in room 215 which was very clean and everything seemed new. The lobby is very nice with a friendly staff and they have a typical continental breakfast. We had a great AAA rate of $54 a night. The motel is in a great location with mini golf right next door! I will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “I really liked it”
Reviews.Author: coolreview
Reviews.Content: Ok, this hotel is a very nice one. Me and my girlfriend stayed here for 2 nights. The room was very nice, we got a King sized bed, carpet was clean, it smelled good in there (compared to somewhere else we stayed) and it had everything we needed. I would stay here again if I come back. The breakfast wasnt what I thought at all so that wasnt a plus, but that didnt matter. The maid made our bed and put fresh towels in there like supposed to. I didnt see any other room so therefore this is a review for a King size bed room. Please note that if you are planning a trip and dont have much money, there are motels on Highway 76 that have WEEKLY rates. Like $119 for one WHOLE week. As opposed to $126 like we paid here for 2nights. Have fun!!! You will find very many things to do here in Branson. TRY AND STAY OFF HIGHWAY 76!!!! IT IS THE DEVIL! Unless you get a motel there and then you cvan just walk to places which is MUCH MUCH better.

Reviews.Title: “Oh no”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Went with my husband and did not like it. Our room smelled and the bed was not comfortable. Paid more and not as other places in Branson we stayed at.

Reviews.Title: “So So”
Reviews.Author: Lorax24
Reviews.Content: This motel is not a bad place to stay, I was just expecting more after having read the reviews on this site. We were told we would be getting a "Queen Upgrade" for one of our rooms, which was supposed to include a daybed w/trundle. This didn't happen, but we did not complain. The most disappointing aspect was the filthy carpet. After walking around Branson for 14 hours we all wanted to go back to the room and take our shoes off. Much to our dismay our feet turned black in less than a few feet of walking. All in all we did not have a bad stay: the continental breakfast had fruit - refreshing in this day and age; the rate was comparable to other motels in the area; non-smoking rooms are truly non-smoking - we did not smell any cigarette smoke or see any of the common signs of smoke. I would rate this motel as a highend motel 8 because of the general cleanliness of the room (except the carpet) and the continental breakfast. Would I stay there again? No, I'd spend a few dollars more and try for a bit more luxury.

Reviews.Title: “Love the Alpenrose!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had never been to Branson and were a little worried since we knew nothing about the hotel. Well, we had absolutely NOTHING to worry about. James, the front desk manager, was helpful from the moment we got there till the day we left, as well as a lady whose name I can't remember. The rooms are spacious , comfortable and CLEAN like you wouldn't believe. If we ever go to Branson, I KNOW where our family will be staying - the Alpenrose Inn!!

Reviews.Title: “Alpenrose is The place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The location is great. It's easy to access any direction in Branson that you want to travel. The rooms are kept very clean. Very friendly and comfortable place to stay. Most of all, very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: “"Great Hotel To Stay At"”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very clean . It has a delicious breakfast and the whole time I was their the pool was always blue and clean. I had a wonderful time in Branson,Missouri and the Alpenrose Inn was great.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Inn”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Alpenrose Inn was awesome!The staff is so friendly.I just can't say enough about the cleanlinees of the rooms and the grounds.The breakfast was delicious and those homemade cobblers were the best I have ever eaten.We will never stay anywhere else but the Alpenrose Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Nice motel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here numerous times and the rooms have always been clean. The staff is friendly and the breakfast was good.

HotelInfo.Name: Brookwood Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2875 Green Mountain Drive, Branson, MO 65016 (Formerly Alpenrose Inn)
